info.name: ROBLOXR - 1.1 - Blue
info.description:
Changes ROBLOX's look in so many ways including

Chat/Party system made to fit the site,
BORDERS REMOVED,
Changes objects to match blue navbar
Arrows on "Game" page now have no background, Just arrows,
BORDERS REMOVED.
info.additionalInfo:
1.1 release
Fixed more broken buttons
Changed sidebar from gray to white and reduced shadow
Notifications on sidebar appear properly

1.0 release
Fixed some broken buttons
Added stuff
BLUE
Removed Borders
